name: Physics Kombat l
description:
Learning science has never been so easy! Physics Kombat I - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 8th class Physics. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Physics Kombat I to clear your fundamental concepts.

Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Eduisfun games have topped the Trending list on Google Play. Learn Physics in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics
Force and Pressure
Friction
Sound
Chemical Effects of Electric Current
Some Natural Phenomena
Light
Solar System

If you like this app, please rate us 5* & drop a review. Your comments help us to make our apps even better!

Additional
-Tracker to keep tab of your weak concepts & improve
-Single player game with no number crunching required
